targets.expr: label_join(sum(container_state_running{snow_compute_pool_name="$snow_compute_pool_name"}) by (snow_database_name, snow_schema_name, snow_service_name, snow_service_container_name, snow_service_container_instance, reason), "join_label", ";", "snow_database_name", "snow_schema_name", "snow_service_name", "snow_service_container_name", "snow_service_container_instance")

label_join(sum(container_state_finished{snow_compute_pool_name="$snow_compute_pool_name"}) by (snow_database_name, snow_schema_name, snow_service_name, snow_service_container_name, snow_service_container_instance, reason), "join_label", ";", "snow_database_name", "snow_schema_name", "snow_service_name", "snow_service_container_name", "snow_service_container_instance")

sum(volume_usage{snow_compute_pool_name="$snow_compute_pool_name"}) by (snow_compute_pool_node_id, snow_volume_name, snow_volume_replica) / sum(volume_capacity{snow_compute_pool_name="$snow_compute_pool_name"}) by (snow_compute_pool_node_id, snow_volume_name, snow_volume_replica)
